casebody.data:
Jansen v. Hilton, 10 J. R. 549.

Not reported in S. Ct.

Voluntary Return. Action against sheriff for an escape. The Court of Errors held that in an action against the sheriff for an escape of a prisoner from the liberties of the jail, the sheriff may avail himself of any defence to the action which he might have had at common law in, an action for an escape from actual custody.

Judgment reversed accordingly.
